Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price slightly above its cost to me but significantly below its market value. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to collaborate on this exciting opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
